overview:
David Laub has over twenty five years experience managing international and finance operations. He spent fourteen years with the international accounting firm, Arthur Andersen. David was recruited as President of the US operations and CFO worldwide for an international fishing company with operations in Asia, Europe, North America and Africa. David also launched his own international fishing company and consulted with CFO Selections, helping high tech and telecommunications companies manage their international finance operations.

Source : IceBreaker.com
